verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy fire burn away, newline My desire of anything, newline That is not of you and is of me, newline I want more of you and less of me,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Empty me, Empty Me, newline And fill, won't you fill me, newline With you, with you, newline Oh Empty me now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh Won't you empty me, Oh Won't you emtpy me now, newline Oh Won't you empty me, Oh Won't you emtpy me now, newline I want more, I want more, I want more newline Of you Jesus. newline I want more, I want more. Ohhhh..

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thank you Jesus, Thank you Jesus, newline Thank You Jesus, Holy Fire, Holy Fire.
